name: English
help: ğŸ± Welcome to Catbox Uploader! This bot can upload your files to Catbox or Litterbox, and return the file's share link. The files you uploaded mustn't violate the Catbox ToS and Litterbox ToS. Commands: /help - Send this help info /settings - Choose a language, service or file expiration. /delete - Delete files uploaded to Catbox. /token - Bind your Catbox token. Also visible in settings. Take a look at my channel @atashare and @atabots for interesting websites and update notes! Source codeï¼šGitHub
uploading: File downloaded successfully. Now uploading to {s}...
error: ğŸ˜¥ Transfer failed! Maybe the server is overloaded, please try later.
flood_protection: ğŸš« Please wait for the current files to finish uploading. Max files allowed at one time {s}.
langSetText: âˆš Language set to English. Send /help to see what I can do!
err_FileTooBig:
ğŸš« File too bigï¼Œexceeds {s} limit!

Catbox limit: Max 200 MB per file
Litterbox limit: Max 1 GB per file
err_TokenNeeded: You need to provide a Catbox token (see here) in order to manage your uploaded files. Use /token [token] to set.
help_delete: To delete files you uploaded to Catbox, use the command /delete. The argument should be the URL or short code of your file. Examples: /delete https://files.catbox.moe/blabla.zip /delete blabla.zip Files on Litterbox cannot be deleted. They will leave you naturally.
help_settings: Tap the buttons below to see description and corresponding options.
help_setLang: To contribute translations, please check the guides on GitHub.
help_setService: Catbox: No expiration, max 200 MB per file Litterbox: File expires after 1/12/24/72 hours, max 1 GB per file Note: You can only upload to one service at a time.
help_setExpr: Files uploaded to Litterbox will expire after the set time. Litterbox supports 4 options below.
animatedStickers: Animated stickers are stored in .tgs format, and I currently can't convert them. Please edit the extension yourself if the file appears abnormal. You can use online converter or bots (like @tgstogifbot) to convert tgs to gif.
fileNotDetected:
No available files detected in the message.

Supported file types: documents, videos, audio, static stickers, GIF. 
Telegram server converts GIFs to mp4, so I upload them as videos.
